Sentencas: The present research used the DC electrodeposition method to apply an Mn-Co-ZrO2 composite coating on the steel interconnect plates of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Oxidation and Electrical Behavior of Mn-Co-ZrO2-Coated Crofer 22 APU Steel by Electrodeposition Method for SOFC Applications

Sentencas: The surface morphology and phase structure of the obtained coating were investigated using a field emission scanning electron microscope (FESEM) equipped with an EDS analyzer and an XRD device, respectively.
Titulo: Oxidation and Electrical Behavior of Mn-Co-ZrO2-Coated Crofer 22 APU Steel by Electrodeposition Method for SOFC Applications

Sentencas: The isothermal oxidation behavior of the samples was also studied by measuring their weight changes after 500 h oxidation at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Oxidation and Electrical Behavior of Mn-Co-ZrO2-Coated Crofer 22 APU Steel by Electrodeposition Method for SOFC Applications

Sentencas: The results of isothermal oxidation showed that the oxidation rates of the coated and uncoated samples were of the order of 10(-14) g(2) cm(-4)
Titulo: Oxidation and Electrical Behavior of Mn-Co-ZrO2-Coated Crofer 22 APU Steel by Electrodeposition Method for SOFC Applications
Oxidation and Electrical Behavior of Mn-Co-ZrO2-Coated Crofer 22 APU Steel by Electrodeposition Method for SOFC Applications
Oxidation and Electrical Behavior of Mn-Co-ZrO2-Coated Crofer 22 APU Steel by Electrodeposition Method for SOFC Applications

Sentencas: XRD analysis confirmed the presence of highly electrically conductive spinels (MnCo2O4 and Co3O4) and ZrO2 particles in the oxidized coating.
Titulo: Oxidation and Electrical Behavior of Mn-Co-ZrO2-Coated Crofer 22 APU Steel by Electrodeposition Method for SOFC Applications

Sentencas: In contrast, it proved the presence of spinels with low electrical conductivity (FeCr2O4 and MnCr2O4) in the oxide scale on the uncoated sample.
Titulo: Oxidation and Electrical Behavior of Mn-Co-ZrO2-Coated Crofer 22 APU Steel by Electrodeposition Method for SOFC Applications
